title: Rajitha Ruby Cascade Necklace - A Timeless Statement
materials: 18K Rose Gold with Diamond Accents; Central Ruby of exceptional clarity; Teardrop Rubies with prong setting. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting lustre.

Three gracefully dangling teardrop rubies complete this stunning piece, adding movement and allure. The pendant's floral-inspired design incorporates subtle nakshi elements, blending tradition with contemporary aesthetics.
